heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (End-of-Life
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (End-of-Life 

Vehicles) (Amendment) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (end-of-life vehicles) (amendment) regulation 2023

title: 2. The European Union (End-of-Life Vehicles) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No
heading: 2. The European Union (End-of-Life Vehicles) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No
text_raw:
2. The European Union (End-of-Life Vehicles) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No 

281 of 2014) are amended by substituting the following definition: 

“‘the Directive’ means the European Parliament and Council Directive 
2000/53/EC of 18 September 2000 on end-of-life vehicles as amended by 
Commission Decision 2002/525/EC2 of 27 June 2002 and Commission 
Decision 2005/438/EC3 of 10 June 2005 and Council Decision 2005/673/EC4 
of 20 September 2005 and Council Directive 2008/33/EC5 of 11 March 2008 
and Commission Decision 2008/689/EC6 of 1 August 2008 and Council 
Directive 2008/112/EC7 of 16 December 2008 and Commission Decision 
2010/115/EU8 of 23 February 2010 and Commission Directive 2011/37/EU9 of 
30 March 2011 and Commission Directive 2013/28/EU10 of 17 May 2013 and 
Commission Directive 2016/774/EU11 of 18 May 2016 and Commission 
Directive (EU) 2017/209612 of 15 November 2017 and Commission Delegated 
Directives (EU) 2020/36213 and (EU) 2020/36314 of 17 December 2019 and 
Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2023/544 of 16 December 202215;”. 

1 O.J. No. L 269, 21.10.2000, p. 34. 
2 O.J. No. L 170, 29.06.2002, p. 81. 
3 O.J. No. L 152, 15.06.2005, p. 19. 
4 O.J. No. L 254, 20.09.2005, p. 69. 
5 O.J. No. L 81, 20.03.2008, p. 62. 
6 O.J. No. L 225, 23.08.2008, p. 10. 
7 O.J. No. L 345, 23.12.2008, p. 68. 
8 O.J. No. L 48, 25.02.2010, p. 12. 
9 O.J. No. L 85, 31.03.2011, p. 3. 
10 O.J. No. L 135, 22.05.2013, p. 14. 
11 O.J. No. L 128, 19.05.2016, p. 4. 
12 O.J. No. L 299, 16.11.2017, p 24. 
13 O.J. No. L 67, 05.03.2020, p.116. 
14 O.J. No. L 67, 05.03.2020, p. 119. 
15 O.J. No. L 73, 10.03.2023, p. 5 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th November, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [532] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 October, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [532]

title: 2. The European Union (End-of-Life Vehicles) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the European Union (End-of-Life Vehicles) 
Regulations 2014 in order to give effect to the provisions of the following 
Commission Delegated Directive: 

a) Commission Delegated Directive 

(EU) 2023/544 of 16 
the 
December 2022 amending Directive 2000/53/EC of 
European Parliament and of the Council as regards the 
exemptions for the use of lead in aluminium alloys for 
machining purposes, in copper alloys and in certain batteries. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [532] 5
